comments.author: rspeyer@gmail.com
comments.body:
Created attachment 392416
makes indirect eval calls legal, but use the global scope

Also modified the DoctestsTest to use the global scope, which is consistent with what the doctest builtin function does.

description:
User-Agent:       Mozilla/5.0 (Macintosh; U; Intel Mac OS X 10_5_7; en-US) AppleWebKit/532.0 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/3.0.196 Safari/532.0
Build Identifier: Rhino 1.7 release 2 2009 03 22

As per 10.4.2 step 1 of the spec.

Reproducible: Always
summary: Make indirect calls to eval legal, but use the global scope
